Open the "Retro Music" application, displaying the playlists interface with options like "My Favorites", "My Playlist", and "Workout".
Click the three dots icon at the top right corner to open the menu.
Click "Settings" to access the application's configuration options.
Scroll down to view more settings options, including "Look and feel", "Now playing", "Audio", "Personalize", "Images", "Notification", "Other", "Backup & Restore", and "About".
